General.Name: Obeikan Glass Co
General.Description: Al Obeikan Glass Company engages in wholesale and retail sale of chemicals and glass panels in Saudi Arabia, and internationally. The company also involved in the operation of quarries; and sand and gravel mines, including crushers. In addition, it manufactures and sells float and laminated glass products, as well as insulating glass used in construction. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Yanbu, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
General.Address: Yanbu Al Sinaiyah, Yanbu, Saudi Arabia, 46459
